short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension captures user emotions and browsing content on social media in order to be able to do behavioral analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When accessing a social media platform, the webcam is activated and facial expressions are captured while browsing social media. Social media content that influenced mood decline is captured for self-reflection. The webcam deactivates once you no longer are on a social media platform. All personal data is immediately deleted once the emotion daily score calculated.
